items.sentence: My hands were shaking too much to thread the needle.

Why don\'t you tell Tom what you want for Christmas?

You\'re supposed to take your shoes off at the door.
Tom informed Mary of his decision to sell the house.
Tom is as hardworking as everyone else in the group.
Tom is drawing a picture of a small boy and his dog.
Don\'t put off until tomorrow what you can do today.
Whoever did it didn\'t want us to find out about it.
